pr_title: Change the SpanExporter to take a collection.

timeline.message: Switch the SpanExporter interface to take a collection.
Switch the SpanExporter interface to take a collection.

timeline.bodyText: Can we really remove this TODO?
timeline.author: carlosalberto
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27,8 +27,6 @@ *

To export data this MUST be register to the {@code TracerSdk} using a {@link * SimpleSpansProcessor} or a {@code BatchSampledSpansProcessor}. */ -// TODO: Change {@code BatchSampledSpansExporter} to {@link BatchSampledSpansExporter} when the

replies.bodyText: Actually, I think we can, as BatchSampledSpansExporter is actually (now) BatchSpanProcessor.

replies.bodyText: yeah, I had no idea even what it meant.  :)
